alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 18 at 4:05AM AKDT until October 19 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 10 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway. * WHEN...From noon to 10 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A wind shift from light northerly to strong southerly will occur late Tuesday into early Wednesday followed by high gusts through the day Wednesday into Wednesday night.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
